content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you with your plumbing, electrical, or HVAC needs today?
Hey! Get the best deals on solar panels and save big! Click here to win huge discounts: spamlink.com
It seems like you may be sending unsolicited promotions. We focus on plumbing, electrical, and HVAC services only. If you need assistance with these, please let me know.
reason: Customer sending unsolicited promotional messages unrelated to our services.
